ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Create reaction for a commit comment
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Create reaction for a commit comment
ActivityMetadata.Description: Create a reaction to a [commit comment](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/comments/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this commit comment.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Create reaction for a commit comment

Create a reaction to a [commit comment](https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/comments/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this commit comment.

Method: Post

OperationID: reactions/create-for-commit-comment

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments/{comment_id}/reactions
